text: Yevgeny Maksimovich Primakov (, tr. Yevgeniy Maksimovich Primakov; 29 October 1929 - 26 June 2015) was a Russian politician and diplomat. He was the Prime Minister of Russia from 1998 to 1999. Primakov was born to a partly Jewish family (his mother was Jewish) in Kyiv, Ukrainian SSR, Soviet Union now Ukraine. ==References== ==Other websites== Category:1929 births Category:2015 deaths Category:Government ministers Category:Jewish politicians Category:Politicians from Kyiv Category:Prime Ministers of Russia Category:Russian diplomats Category:Russian Jews Category:Russian Orthodox Christians Category:Soviet Jews Category:Soviet politicians
title: Yevgeny Primakov
